summary: An investigator for the district attorney and his amateur-sleuth wife compete to solve a murder mystery.
cast: Joan Blondell|Melvyn Douglas|Mary Astor|Frances Drake|Jerome Cowan|Robert Paige|Thurston Hall|Pierre Watkin|Walter Kingsford|Lester Matthews|William 'Billy' Benedict|Wade Boteler|Ralph Brooks|William Burgess|Wyn Cahoon|Nell Craig|Gennaro Curci|George Davis|Joe De Stefani|Tom Dugan|Eddie Dunn|Eddie Fetherston|Bess Flowers|John Gallaudet|Bud Geary|Rita Hayworth|Bud Jamison|Robert Emmett Keane|Arthur Loft|George McKay|Harold Miller|Bert Moorhouse|Gene Morgan|Ted Oliver|Lee Phelps|Lucille Ward|Marek Windheim
keywords: screwball comedy|murder|district attorney|husband and wife sleuths|threat
title: Siempre hay una mujer
